title: The Heart Of The Forest
description: A Young Woman's Erotic Journey To Her Dark Heart. An Explicit Short Story Of Carnal Lust Under The Full Moon.Here's what Lynn said about The Heart Of The Forest on Amazon.com...5.0 out of 5 stars Loved this November 5, 2014By LynnFormat:Kindle EditionLoved this short story by Paul James..When you feel the story is headed in one direction James takes you on a completely different ride.
